components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Orange Network in Belgium

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Orange Network in Belgium. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delay to Dish Network in US via subset of Longcode. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Customers Receiving Duplicate SENT Status Callbacks for Whatsapp Channel

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue for whatsapp channel where customers may receive duplicate SENT status callbacks and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 day or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Event Streams

incidents.name: Push Notification Delivery Issue for Customers still using FCM Legacy APIs

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with GCM/Legacy FCM push notification delivery for customers still using FCM legacy APIs. Customers need to Migrate to new FCM HTTP v1 API to avoid any service disruption: https://help.twilio.com/articles/20768292997147-Updating-Twilio-Push-for-FCM-HTTP-v1-API.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, September 7th, 2024, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window, Insights Historical Dashboards will be unavailable, and any scheduled ETLs will be affected.

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our MMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 September 2024 at 23:00 PDT until 04 September 2024 at 06:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets via subset of United States long codes.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

04 September 2024 at 23:00 PDT until 05 September 2024 at 06:00 PDT
